item.title: Resume
item.description: We are all a masterpiece in progress. We are all capable of great things. As such I strive to create excellent software that creates delightful experiences for end users. I am a Software Engineer based on the Seatle Area, you can find out more about my career history in my LinkedIn Profile . Every now and then I contribute with Vizzes to Tableau Public , this website as well as few others (such as BrewingCats ) that I maintain are hosted in GitHub (here my profile ) or in GitLab .
